thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Femino
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Femino

author: Femino
title: Femino
text:
I do most of the work on my own car. After I explained to Chris what my needs and requirements were, he showed me the options they had. The system did not show the inventory correctly and so when they went to get the tires, he was able to do a price adjustment for the next tier without hesitation.
Will recommend going to this location especially asking for Chris.
Thanks man!
